description: Rowen Jackson"The Jackhammer"Ht: 5'9" WT: 150lbs Season W/L record ( 0-0)Andrew Collins"The Assassin"Ht: 5'9" WT: 155lbsSeason W/L record (0-0) Brand new to Naked Kombat we have Andrew "The Assassin" Collins taking on Rowen "The Jackhammer" Jackson. The Assassin has had some tactical police training before and plans on utilizing it down on the mat. With a few years of karate under his belt, The Jackhammer says he's going to send his opponent packing. The Assassin doesn't even pose The Jackhammer as a threat, he says he's just a San Francisco hippy, and he's going to fuck that hairy monkey till he screams for mercy. Watch as these two newcomers fight their way to victory while the loser gets his hole fucked into submission.
title: Rowen "The Jackhammer" Jackson vs Andrew "The Assassin" Collins
